resources.string: Let\'s pick some defaults. You can always change these things later in the settings.

Select a folder where %1$s will store chapter downloads, backups, and more.

A dedicated folder is recommended.

Selected folder: %2$s
Updating from an older version and not sure what to select? Refer to the Tachiyomi upgrade section on the Mihon storage guide for more information.
To install the app on updates.
Get notified for library updates and more.
Avoid interruptions to long-running library updates, downloads, and backup restores.
Entries in this category will moved into the default category.
A category with that name already exists!
Press and hold to edit a category
Your library is empty, add series to your library from the browse tab.
No matches found for your current filters
Move collapsed dynamic categories to bottom
When grouping library by sources, status, etc.
Can also be found by expanding library filters
Tap the Library icon to show filters
Allowing notifications is recommended to keep your library and app up to date.
Large updates may lead to increased battery usage and sources becoming slower. Tap to learn more.
Warning: large bulk downloads may lead to sources becoming slower and/or blocking Tachiyomi. Tap to learn more.
Skipped because there are unread chapters
Skipped because no chapters are read
Skipped because series does not require updates
Only update series if there is no unread chapter (completely read)
Update only when the conditions are met
When sorting alphabetically, sort ignoring articles (a, an, the) at the start of a series\' title
Categories to include in global update
Refresh covers in library as well when updating library
Certain buttons can be found in other places if disabled here
Search tips will show up periodically. Long press the suggestion to search it.
This will remove the read date of \"%1$s\". Are you sure?
No recently read or updated series
Press and hold can also reset chapter history
Are you sure? All history will be lost.
Show read chapters in Grouped and All
Install and start Shizuku to use Shizuku as extension installer.
Allows extensions to be installed without user prompts and enables automatic updates for devices under Android 12
Legacy installer is not yet implemented, currently falling back to PackageInstaller (Default)
Malicious extensions can read any stored login credentials or execute arbitrary code.\n\nBy trusting this extension you accept these risks.
This extension is no longer available.
This extension is not from the official Tachiyomi extensions list.
MIUI Optimization must be disabled to install extensions.
Some extensions may still prompt to be installed first.
Use this image as cover art?
Changing this will reset the reading mode for this series
The amount of pages to preload when reading. Higher values will result in a smoother reading experience, at the cost of higher cache and network usage.
Reduces banding, but may impact performance
If disabled, the transition page will be skipped if the next chapter is loaded
Cutout area behavior only applies in portrait mode with certain scale types
On devices older than Android 9.0, you need to set cutout settings manually through your system settings
While using automatic page layout, you can still switch between layouts while reading without overriding this setting
Creates folders according to manga title
Sensitivity for hiding menu on scroll
If reader loads a blank image incrementally reduce the threshold.\nSelected: %s
This entry\'s details page must be viewed before being able to migrate
You have an entry in your library with the same name but from a different source (%1$s).\n\nDo you still wish to continue?
Series must be in your library to edit
One-way sync to update the chapter progress in tracking services. Set up tracking for individual entries from their tracking button.
Services that provide enhanced features for specific sources. Entries are automatically tracked when added to your library.
Update tracking when marked as read
Tracker cannot be removed from %1$s while offline
Keep both on %1$s and only replace locally
Please log in to MAL again
Select a source, then select an item to migrate
Include extra search parameter when searching
Use source with the most chapters (slower)
To show this screen again, go to Settings -> Sources.
No chapters found, this series cannot be used for migration
Secure screen hides app contents when switching apps and block screenshots
By default, side navigation is used for certain phones and small tablets when in landscape, and always shows on larger tablets
Show a larger, expanded toolbar at the top of most pages (does not show on smaller devices regardless of setting)
Some languages may require an app relaunch to display correctly
Includes recently read, updated, and added series
When there\'s no new chapters, the series\' details will open instead
Can be used to restore current library
Invalid backup file type: %1$s\nIt should end with ".proto.gz" or ".json".
Backup does not contain any entries.
No library entries to back up
Data from the backup file will be restored.\n\nYou will need to install any missing extensions and log in to tracking services afterwards to use them.
Automatic backups are highly recommended. You should keep copies in other places as well.
What do you want to backup?
Backup/restore may not function properly if MIUI Optimization is disabled.
Include sensitive settings (e.g. tracker login tokens)
Force app to recheck downloaded chapters
Try new features before they\'re officially released. Beta releases may be unstable and are provided to give feedback to the developer.
Rolling back to the previous production version may cause issues and could require clearing app data.
Beta releases may be unstable and could require clearing app data.
Saves error logs to a file for sharing with the developers
Some manufacturers have additional app restrictions that kill background services. This website has more info on how to fix it.
Print verbose logs to system log (may reduces app performance)
Requires app restart to take effect
Delete history for entries that are not saved in your library
Are you sure? Read chapters and progress of non-library entries will be lost
Updates covers, genres, description and entries status information
Updates status, score and last chapter read from the tracking services
Delete non-existent, partially downloaded, and read chapter folders
Disable this if you are experiencing issues with updating or restoring your library
Delete old and unused cached covers of entries in your library that has been updated.\nCurrently using: %1$s
Clear cached covers not in library
Delete all covers cached that are not in your library \nCurrently using: %1$s
Some extensions may not be auto-updated if they were installed outside this app
Only enable your pinned sources for migration
Only enable your currently enabled sources for migration
Use last saved pre-migration preferences and sources to mass migrate
You can also migrate by selecting entries in your library
Show in sources and extensions lists
This does not prevent unofficial or potentially incorrectly flagged extensions from surfacing NSFW (18+) content within the app.
You haven\'t added any repos yet.
Are you sure you wish to delete the repo \"%s\"?
Repository %1$s has the same Signing Key Fingerprint as %2$s.\nIf this is expected, %2$s will be replaced, otherwise contact your repo maintainer.
Helps fix any bugs. No sensitive data will be sent
Username or password cannot be blank
Downloads can be cancelled by swiping them away\nSwipe this tip to dismiss it
Visit the recents tab to access the download queue. You can also double tap or press and hold for quicker access
Couldn\'t download chapters due to low disk space
May fix issue with downloaded chapters conflicts with one another when they have the same name
Could not download chapter due to unexpected error
Only works on entries in library and if the current chapter plus the next one are already downloaded
Delete downloaded chapters if the source has removed the chapter online
Delete during global updates, ask on chapters page
Time spent in the reader, based on chapter history
No data found for your current filters
Failed to acquire persistent folder access. The app may behave unexpectedly.
Tap here for help with Cloudflare
Please update the WebView app for better compatibility
WebView is required for the app to function
See your recently updated library entries
Widget not available when app lock is enabled
Mark a range of chapters as read
Mark a range of chapters as unread
Are you sure you wish to delete this saved search query: \'%1$s\'?
%s ran into an unexpected error. We suggest you screenshot this message, dump the crash logs, and then share it to a GitHub Issue.
